FuncDef:
The traffic-policing test enable command enables the traffic policing test for NQA test flows.
The undo traffic-policing test enable command disables the traffic policing test for NQA test flows.
By default, the traffic policing test for NQA test flows is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A traffic policing test helps verify whether traffic policing takes effect on a tested network on which an Ethernet service activation test is conducted. If the traffic policing test for NQA test flows is disabled, a performance test is conducted immediately.
Precautions
This command is only run for an Ethernet service activation test instance.
